conbody.p: functionsmiscellaneous functionsmiscellaneous functionsin the expression languageThe expression language includes the following miscellaneous functions:

dlentry.dd: Returns the value for the specified runtime configuration.

Uses the following argument:
runtime configuration name - Name of the configuration property to use. The property must defined in the sdc.properties file or in a runtime configuration file specified in the sdc.properties file.

Returns the ID.
When the runs in standalone execution mode, the ID is a unique identifier associated with the , such as 58efbb7c-faf4-4d8e-a056-f38667e325d0. The ID is stored in the following file: <SDCinstalldir>/data/sdc.id.
When the runs in cluster mode, the ID is the worker partition ID generated by Spark.
